summary:
A small hideout placed in between the city of Whiterun and the town of Riverwood.

Suitable for assassins, alchemists, thieves and the kind.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a small hideout to the hills of Whiterun, close to the river.

Features:

A full shack with alchemy ingredients, a non-respawning chest for your many treasures, a dinner table and shelves with numerous ingredients and clutter for your need

A full crafting area!

An alchemy table

A table and chair to watch the view of steam rising through the cracked ground

Numerous torches

Be sure to check the images for a map location and demonstrations of the mod!

Thank you for downloading.

Enjoy :)
author: Voodou
